Question
========

Which of the following statements about environments (relative to lists) is **NOT** true?

Answerlist
----------

* Every name in an environment must be unique
* The names in an environment are not ordered
* An environment has a parent
* Environments are not copied when modified
* An environment cannot contain itself

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* They must be unique
* They are not ordered
* Every environment has a parent
* They are not copied.
* Correct, an environment can contain itself.
